column5: This was sent to me today and I thought I'd pass it along... No need for a meter, just drop to know!  http://www.youtube.com/embed/Y_m6p99l6ME  HH
I'm going to wait to see people try this with 12V car batteries    BUT YOUTUBE TOLD ME SO!!!!
I'm going to wait to see people try this with 12V car batteries    BUT YOUTUBE TOLD ME SO!!!!  Works best on glass surface I heard....
Ya, thin glass works better.  If the battery doesn't bounce, at least the glass will shatter.
